hero.title: Evaluate XAI Experiences with XEQ
hero.subtitle: The iSee XEQ Scale helps you measure the quality of user experiences with explainable AI systems.

try.title: Try the Scale Online
try.description: Use the XEQ scale directly in your browser to evaluate your XAI system.

handbook.title: Download the Handbook
handbook.description: A complete guide to using and interpreting the XEQ scale.

questionnaire.title: Get the Questionnaire
questionnaire.description: Download the validated questionnaire as a PDF document.

learn.title: Find Out More
learn.description: Learn how the scale was developed and validated by researchers.

footer.text: iSee Project ©2025 – Evaluating the Human Experience of Explainable AI
